title: The quality is always impeccable
text: The quality is always impeccable. Prices & customer service are excellent as well

title: Best purchase!
text: Vanessa flair has hands down the most reliable jewellery.  When I first saw their site I was a little hesitant because of the high price range of the pieces but then I think back to all the times I've bought cheap pieces from H&M or even brand names one, the quality never lasts.  I felt reassured seeing their 365 days guaranteed so decided to go through with it, needless to say they are Perfect! I've gotten so many compliments for every single one of my pieces.

title: CldT Studios Review
text: Hello!David from Cld.T StudiosMaybe size options for the jewelry.          My neck and wrist are bigger than most, does that mean that I can’t wear your good quality jewelry? AndPackaging upgrades           Maybe in the future, my suggestion would be to improve the customer experience in terms of the unboxing experience.Thank you for taking your time to read this, I look forward to continuing and building our relationship!Take care!David Palmer, Cld.T Studios

title: Words Cant Explain
text: Words Cant Explain, Completely & Extremely Satisfied With My Jewelry Items From Vanessa Flair....Being Happy Doesn't Have To Cost A River, Use Code: RICHIERICH For A 30% Supportive Discount....= Being Content Makes The Soul Smile 💯

title: Couldn’t be happier!
text: Love all the jewelry! Rings, earrings, necklaces, bracelets. Everything looks so high end and goes beautifully together.

title: Great ring
text: I think the ring is really pretty, I wear it everyday. The weight of the ring is a lot lighter than I thought though but still a great ring. It’s wearing a bit already but I don’t take my rings off really ever so that’s to be expected at some point, just didn’t think it would happen so quick. Either way, I love the ring and would buy again.

title: I think they have a great selection of…
text: I think they have a great selection of men’s jewelry and I hope they will expand their collection- would love to see some red jewelry

title: The items seem solid and of good…
text: The items seem solid and of good material as they all have a good weight to them. Delivery did take a while but it’s coming from another country so there are no complaints there. I was disappointed in the earrings; I went to try the earrings on,  pull the back off and in the process the earring post came off too so I wasn’t able to try it wear the earrings.

title: The worst customer service ever
text: The worst customer service ever. Tried to contact them multiple times throughout the month with my issue with no response except for “we’ve taken your inquiry” response. I understand it might take some time, I don’t care if it’ll take a couple of months to resolve my issue, but at least keep me in the loop. Jewelry comes in a very cheap packaging. There is 1 pouch, which doesn’t make sense, I bought 3 pieces for my friends, how am I gonna present them with no brand pouch? Very disappointed.

title: Happy Happy Customer
text: At first I thought it was all fake and that if i ever received my jewels they would be cheap and sub par ... but I was pleasantly surprised to find I was wrong.The jewels are quality pieces and have received appropriate praise from business associates and strangers. 5 stars for me . wonderful job. Keep it up Vanessaflair

title: i truly love this brand
text: i truly love this brand! i can tell how much detail goes into making these beautiful pieces of jewelry! im such a huge fan of all the earrings you all make! they are stunning and i always recommend you all to my friends! great quality and you feel beautiful wearing it!

title: Best Jewelry Ever!
text: Vanessaflair has the most beautiful jewelry! I often receive compliments when wearing the jewelry. I will continue buying till I get every item. And delivery is quick too! It’s a professional company and I’m extremely pleased.

title: Communication could be better
text: Communication could be better. Also, I wrote a few times asking if I had to pay shipping every single time and no response. I feel like if you want to keep people as ambassadors then we shouldn’t have to pay for anything. I did enjoy taking pictures with your jewelry the first time so thank you.

title: Never received package
text: Never received package. Opened a ticket and never heard back from them even after following up.First emailed you on Jan 16 and just now got a response on Feb 11 because of the bad review. Just to say to check with the post office. Like I mentioned on Jan 16 I contacted the delivery service and they declared it lost. I attached their certificate declaring it lost.

title: my boyfriend really likes his ring but…
text: my boyfriend really likes his ring but mine was scratchy. the bracelet also wasn’t as oversized as i liked. i had paid for shipping on a previous order and after it was delivered, someone broke into my mailbox and stole it. kids probably. the customer service didn’t refund or resend or offer any help. so. that’s a bummer. if the jewelry was nicer, i may not have mentioned!

title: I did not appreciate the quality
text: The jewellery I received looked like the picture which I appreciated. But the quality was disappointing considering the price of the products on the website. The necklace I received broke after one wear, it wasn't pulled or dropped, it just broke out of no where. Overall the products feel a little cheap.

title: i recommend buying from this site very much
text: when i decided to buy jewelry for my wife i asked my best friend and he recommended vanessaflair.com to me it was so good website as i can buy the best collection of jewelry from it with a high qualitythe site customer service was so helpful and cooperativei recommend buying from this site very much

title: I liked my jewelry but some of them…
text: I liked my jewelry but some of them were a little off from what I was expecting based on the pictures. Shipping took longer than expected as well. However, I am satisfied with my experience.

title: Criminals
text: Criminals! Vanessa Flair sent me a different ring than I ordered, a cheap looking one, not even depicted on their webpage. I returned it, they received it, but never refunded my $64. So now I have no ring, and Vanessa Flair has simply stolen my money, and stopped all communication. Vanessa Flair is fake, located in Zhejiang in China, and should be reported to the police.

title: Didn't receive package
text: I didn't even receive both of my packages. It says it has been delivered but I didn't even receive the package and there's no way of knowing where the package even ended up. I am really disappointed. I was so excited to wear the jewelry I bought as well. Now the Vanessa flair team doesn't even reply to me after telling me to check with the neighbours if its was delivered. I checked and they said they haven't seen the package as well.

title: My order was delayed 2 weeks even…
text: My order was delayed 2 weeks even though it already took 3-4 weeks to ship internationally. When i received my package it was missing 4 out of 7 items ordered. I didn’t get a refund or have any customer service information to possibly receive compensation. The package was not delivered to my home i had plenty of delivery issues . I had to get the what was left of my destroyed package from USPS after being lied to by USPS about where my package was located. They said they didn’t have my package for 2 days and then suddenly they found it and i was missing the important pieces of my package and never received the rest of them. I am very unhappy.

title: Vanessa Flair Ambassors Recruitment Bad Experience
text: Vanessa Flair Ambassors recruitment is not reliable,  its not real!! Happend to me. Ive choosed the  "free jewelry" and they made me pay $ 30 for shipping but your order never arrived. I asked for refund but had no success. I don't recommend . I really didn't like the experience. Now they just dont reply to my emails. Its sad.

title: My experience with the company/ brand…
text: My experience with the company/ brand has been amazing in receiving my products I purchased . Thank you again

title: The jewelry is beautiful
text: The jewelry is beautiful.  It's just the delivery that's a problem.  I got an email stating the jewelry had been delivered and it had not.  That happened another time, too.  And it takes a while to get the order.  I finally got it quickly after emailing you.  Really pretty.

title: I would buy again. Highly Recommended
text: They are easy to wear and match with lots of outfitsDress up or down perfectly; great value for the money. I have been looking for these for a while, and these absolutely were perfect. A good selection of the colors that I wanted in the great stones.Highly recommend it for yourself or as a great gift idea.They were heavier and of higher quality than I was expecting. Time will tell how well they hold up after regular use.

title: I wish the delivery package set can be…
text: I wish the delivery package set can be change. The product of necklace original price was $70. However, when customer receive products and open it, the item not looks like $70. Is there any chance you can change package product design into a small box?

title: Good quality products
text: At first I thought that quality won't be up to the mark but after using the jewels I got to know that quality was perfect too 😊 happy with my purchase. Would recommend to others as well.

title: This unfortunately is a scam
text: This unfortunately is a scam. They contact content creators/influencers etcetera offering them a collab. After being accepted (everyone gets accepted) they will send you free jewelry, however you do have to pay 30 USD shipping costs. The jewelry itself is however just cheap Aliexpress jewelry worth maybe 4 or 5 bucks. Don't fall for it! Also, protect your children from companies like these. They're specifically targeting children that have set up some youtube or Instagram channel. I myself am the manager of such an account and they thought they were dealing with the two minors that are shown in the content, not knowing they were in fact dealing with me as their manager.  So this is the worst kind of scam imaginable... Do not buy from them and most certainly don't accept the free items as they're not free at all!

title: Classic and Stylish
text: Classic and StylishBought a Timothy ring recently , the quality is amazing and so was the customer care. Highly recommended especial if you want your product delivered fast .

title: Generouse gift with the weel
text: Generouse gift with the weel. Quick arrival of the parcel. The quality isn’t very showing in a plastic bag. Sadly not enough silver choice.

title: I never received my package
text: I never received my package. I was invited to become an ambassador, and I paid $30 for shipping last April. It’s been almost 3 months and I haven’t received my package.I contacted their support several times and they are of no use.The tracking number they sent me shows the package is still in China!I’m very disappointed.

title: Order never been delivered
text: I ordered almost 50 days ago, and I didn’t receive anything, you were delaying the order then you put on the system that it’s delivered.I emailed you and no one answered.

title: I'll recommend this to anyone who's…
text: I'll recommend this to anyone who's looking for a place to buy jewelry. The prices are very affordable, there were a lots of peices to choose from and the shipment service is very quick.

title: Just great!
text: I love Vanessa Flair jewelry because I don't have to worry about the color turning black. I can take shower with with it or swim and nothing happens to it. It’s a high quality and not expensive.

title: Received only part of order

text: I appreciate the opportunities to purchase lovely jewelry with Vanessa Flair.  The products arrive in a nice package and I they have always been correct.  Shipping does take a long time, but I receive tracking information that is very beneficial.

title: Very shady

Seems VERY shady

title: POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE
text: POOR CUSTOMER SERVICEI received three lovely jewels from Vanessa Flair, which all promptly broke within 24 hours of wear. I reached out to the contact email I had sharing my concern and asking for a shipping refund. I sent in images of the broken jewels and never heard from them again. I reached out a second time, where I had to send NEW photos of the broken product. This was in APRIL 2022. I still haven't received a refund or follow up.

title: I recommend
text: my order, #6662, it was over a month ago.I had issues regarding the shipping deadline, (this has been changed a few times and it made me a little worried).But today I received my jewelry! And they are perfect and are just like the ones I chose on the site!I recommend the jewelry and the store!

title: Great new jewelery brand
text: The gold seems real, the jewelery is big enough to be noticeable, but small enough to be casual everyday. I love the designs. And the bracelets are very feminine

title: Great company
text: Great company, they have delivered on being a great partner in business. I have been an ambassador with VanessaFlair for a few months, love it!

title: Def amazed with the products and the quality
text: Was amazed about the quality of the products. I've ordered 3 pieces of rings - 2 of them do not come off of my hands. It is amazing how comfortable they are. Another one is for special occasions only. Also I've ordered 1 necklace, 1 bracelet and 1 ring for my man. He keeps his ring on on his free days, because he says, that he doesn't want to scratch it. But, come on, he went to work with that ring (he works in a factory and there is a lot of manual work) and there was no scratch on the ring. As for another - way more expensive - visual scratches. The bracelet comes with me everywhere - to the shower, cooking meals, cleaning, exercizing. And I am amazed how well it stays :) I did not brake not a single time, whereas other ones broke the same day I've put them on. So I don't know about the other shoppers, but I am very pleased with the quality, the shipping, the communication and service of the Vanessa Flair team. I am deffinetely a satisfied customer. Also, Valentines and mothers' days are coming. Guess where I am going to look for nice presents? :)

title: It’s a TRICKY company
text: Necklaces don’t have length measurements when ordering. So when I received it, it was super short and not the look I was hoping to get. Also, the fact that I “won” a gift card yet the gift card doesn’t work on shipping and then I can’t use the whole amount won because there’s a 3 piece limit, not fair. Then icing on the cake. When placing an order it showed a $0 shipping charge but when I entered a discount code, boom, shipping is now $30. I called customer service to inquire and they said if your in a certain area shipping is $0 (which is why it showed $0) but because I was getting a discount I need to pay an out of country shipping fee. CRAZY! This is not how you attract a fan base when gift cards in USA can be used like a credit card. Shipping fees are generally part of the “fee” that can be paid with a gift card. It’s just a shady way to make more $ off customers! You can easily get similar fashion jewelry half the price at local stores rather than all of the hassle.
everything was great, but jewelry was too yellow for my taste, also mens necklace was a little bit too short. I would suggest specifying the length of the necklaces.

title: Jewellery for every occasion
text: It is always a blast to receive a pack of new jewellery! One was a perfect gift to a friend, and I’ve worn mine to a concert, a speach, a dinner and of course in my every day life!

title: Jewelry Scam- Beware!
text: Jewelry Scam- Be ware!I was smart enough to google reviews about VanessaFllair before "choosing free jewelry" on their ambassador recruitment plan. The "free" means you have to pay 30$ for shipping.Why I suspected them?1. I replied twice to their recruitment email AND the IG msg asking if their jewelry is nickel free as i'm very allergic. They didn't reply. Then i saw all their jewelry says "nickel free"- shouldn't their agents know this?2. It's flattering to be contacted on IG but stop and think why would they contact small accounts? and send you "hundred of dollars" worth of jewelry for free?3. Their IG account seems fake- over 200k followers and barely following anyone. The number of followers increases by tens of thousands each day. suspicious.4. Last but not least- I FOUND THEIR JEWLERY ON ALIEXPRESS FOR FRACTION OF THE PRICE! you can download the free "find on AliExpress" lens tool, i manages to find every pair of earrings (ranging 60$ a pair on VanessaFlair website) for about 3-6$ on AliExpress.Please be ware people.... check before you commit to giving them your credit card. even things that appear free may not be, and come in bad quality (18k gold plated? PLEASE)

title: Website is easy to use and items are…

title: Vanessa Flairs jewels are beautiful and…

title: Looks fake, maybe scam
text: Well, it looks disappointing, I have ordered twice, but the quality of jewelry I received according to test results in an offline jewelry shop is not the same as stated at their website and on the marks (stated 17-18 k, the test has shown much less, around 1,7 in average for 4 items). After second order I did not get any tracking number and when I asked for it I was ignored twice. At the jewelry shop where I checked the items I was told that such items cost around $ 5 each which means they make money on the shipping cost you cover if you join as an ambassador because you just overpay the real cost twice. I have requested chargeback, because I think it's not a British company, their items are fake even when look good and in general it looks like another scam scheme.

title: Is Vanessa Flair a legit company?
text: In July Vanessa Flair has been approached me by social media for asking me to become their ambassador. I accepted to try the products and I made my order which was charged for about 30£ when their site claims for free shipment. It wasn't free. This is the 1st red flag. They shouldn't ask the ambassadors to pay shipment when they make over 90£ order.The 2nd red flag is when I have discovered that the same products are being selling in another platforms for ridiculous low prices. This fact made me think that this company maybe is a scam.I also checked that the address in London they provide seems to be valid as many companies are housed there, but Vanessa Flair isn't registered in the official list of all of them. This is the 3rd red flag.A month passed away without receiving my order. Although the company has sent me an email that they have been informed that I have already received the package, I replied them that is not true and that they should fix this. Eventually they did.The jewelry I received are indeed gold plated but seems poorly made and faux that they don't justify the high price. I give 2 stars because I received my order at least.

title: Please refund the money I paid for shipping.
text: I ordered jewelry and paid for shipping.  After a certain time, the site said that the package had been delivered, but I did not receive it.  For several days I looked for it in post offices, then I wrote to technical support, they promised that I would receive them in a week.  A week later, nothing has changed.  After a few more correspondence with technical support, it turned out that my package did not reach me and returned back.  Then I asked for my money back.  I wrote to support several times, they only promised to return, but in fact nothing has changed.  If anyone is reading this please take action to resolve this situation!

title: Don't let them to scam you!
text: Don't let them to scam you, they promise you'll recieve products for free as their Ambassador but in the end they will make you pay 30$ for shipping. Which is against their own policy because ATTENTION - as they say in their FAQ - "For orders over $60, shipping is free." Oh, really? But if I choose 3 products from your website the value will be certainly much more than 60$ so why you want me to pay shipping fee during all this ambassador talk?This company wrote to me on Instagram, they asked if I want to be an Ambassador of their products. Ambassador my foot! They said all I need to do is to pick 3 products from their website and I'll receive them FOR FREE. My work is to make Instastory or post with photo of their products mentioning their company name every month. Before I choose the products I decided to check reviews on TrustPilot. After I learnt the company is a scam I confronted them asking if it's true they want Ambassadors to pay 30$ for the shipping, I was just curious what they'll say. Guess what, after I asked them, they stopped answering me. No more words needed, this is pure scam.

title: The ambassador scam
text: They contacted me to be an ambassador for the brand even though I am not an influencer and I just have 600+ followers. I said twice that I wasn't interested but still they pressure me by sending me a discount code for 3 pieces of jewelry. I checked Trustpilot straight away and I saw this is what they do, they are trying to get you to pay the shipping fee for jewelry that looks like it's not the best quality. ( I can not say much about the quality I just can see what people have expressed here)I definitely think it's a scam because no one will give 300 dollars worth of jewelry for 30 dollars to a person who it's not present on social media.

title: Scam
text: Be careful everyone it’s a scam Company. They offered 3 pieces jewellery for ambassador program but you have to pay $29 shipping fee to receive the jewellery. The jewellery is $6 on Chinese website. They are scamming you with this. I wish I have read some of the comments here earlier. I tried to cancel the order right after I realised this within the 24 hours. Never get a reply from the email. title: Beautiful jewelry at an affordable…

title: Hi there,
text: Hi there,I’ve chosen to provide your company with a detailed review of the 3 products I chose from the website. While I would much rather wear the jewelry and post to instagram to promote the company, I don’t feel comfortable doing so considering the quality of the products I received. The CLAIRE earrings were definitely the best of the 3, they are heavy and seem well made and sturdy. The SYNIM necklace I wasn’t so impressed with. I honestly looked at this piece and thought “I could have made this myself”. The gold circle is just a large jump ring, which is open. The two sides don’t even touch- this looks incredibly cheap. The circle of pearls is actually just a circle of plastic beads. Lastly, I’m not sure what you mean by waterproof- because if I were to wear this in the shower I’m sure the plated stainless steel would not be a gold colour for very long. Lastly was the Monroe ring. If I’m honest I bought a ring so that if I loved the products, I would be able to wear one of each piece for a photo to post. But looking to choose online I was really turned off by all of the ring choices due to the fact that none of them were actually closed. I understand this is cheaper for the company as you don’t have to stock multiple sizes, but it looks incredibly cheap and there is no need for that considering it cost $70 on the site. I’d also like to add that one of the stones in my ring came cracked or scuffed or something which made it matte and not sparkle like the rest which really stands out. I tried to get it in the photos. I’d also like to point out how cheap and scrappy the packaging was. Perhaps my expectations were just too high but for jewelry, I was expecting at least a box. The cheap plastic envelopes and baggies were not a welcome surprise. If I’m honest, my initial reaction after opening the bubble mailer was “I’ve been scammed”. Other than the plastic, the stapled piece of paper with the bow on it attached to the necklace really screams ‘made in china’. While I appreciate not having to pay the $220 you would have charged for the three pieces, I did have to pay $30 in shipping which is odd and outrageous because the mailer said it had only been sent from Ontario. Overall, I am not satisfied with the quality of the products I’ve received and I believe they are extremely overpriced on your website.

title: SCAM  I should have read the reviews…
text: SCAM  I should have read the reviews before buying any jewelry from them.  I bought it and after a month I still haven't received anything.  I tried emailing them to cancel my order with no response.  Beware of this “company”

title: Read their reviews
text: Read their reviews, it is a bit fishy that each review starts exactly the same way. They offered me free products but never click on their link it is fraud.

title: I want everyone to read this carefully.
text: I want everyone to read this carefully.This company is a deceitful scam using cheap Chinese jewellery sold at high prices. Their glowing customer reviews and ratings stem from the fact that they either hack social media or employ someone to do it for them. My instagram account was hacked and used to dm 100's of strangers who have used hashtags in their post to indiciate they have enough common interestes to buy internet jewelery. My Instagram account is not the only account that has been used against the owners wishes to do so.Stay away from this garbage dump at all costs.

title: Vanessa Flair is a scam!!!
text: Vanessa Flair jewelry is a scam! They ask to join their ambassador program and claim to send 3 pieces of free jewelry every month. However, their jewelry is not authentic and is very overpriced on their website. The jewelry is indeed sent for free, but you end up paying $30 for shipping. Their jewelry is worth about $2-$4 per piece, so they end up making money from every ambassador that orders their jewelry. If you ever worked with brands, you know that its all about sales. And if you don't drive sales the brand won't gain anything from working with you. Then why would a brand like Vanessa Flair send their ambassadors 3 pieces of jewelry EACH MONTH that costs $75-$80 on average??? BECAUSE THEIR JEWELRY COSTS $2-$4 AND THEY MAKE THEIR MONEY FROM THE SHIPPING COSTS EVERY AMBASSADOR IS PAYING THEM + anyone who does end up purchasing from the ambassadors. Anyone who has ever owned real gold jewelry can detect theirs is not authentic 18k gold plated as they claim. Please be careful who you work with as an ambassador!

title: do not buy anything
text: do not buy anything, the brand is a scamThey will ask you to be an ambassador to withdraw money from youEverything is false

title: In love
text: I absolutely love the three pieces I received. They feel like high quality jewelry. You don’t have to worry about these pieces turning your skin green. I have showered with these pieces and never had a problem with them like most other jewelry brands. I am not really a gold girl but the gold on these pieces are absolutely gorgeous. I wish I could rate these pieces a 10. I would recommend to anyone.

title: I love being an ambassador for Vanessa…
text: I love being an ambassador for Vanessa Flair!! I’ve received everything they’ve promised and the jewelry is very good quality! Ranee Gilbert

title: Vanessa Flair = dropshipping
text: Beware, Vanessa Flair is a scam. The jewelry sold for about $80 all cost $2 to $4 on Aliexpress. I was able to check with the Google Lens app (by scanning their photos). This is dropshipping, and it's illegal! They are looking for ambassadors to look like a real brand created by a woman, when it's a man behind this scam. Do not become an ambassador for them, you will gain absolutely nothing.ps : I already have an objective opinion, the quality is the same.

title: Necklaces, Bracelets, and Rings...Oh My!
text: Received 3 pieces @vanessaflairjewellry and couldn't be happier! The quality and design of the ring, bracelet, and necklace exceeded my expectations. My new go to for all things jewelry.

title: Definitely recommend!
text: My order was promptly filled and delivered on time. The jewelry is beautiful and well made! Would definitely recommend!

title: Love the service
text: Love the service. Everything was easy and efficient during checkout as well as tracking and shipping. Totally in love :)

title: I just received the jewelry in the mail…
text: I just received the jewelry in the mail so I haven't had a chance to wear any of it to see how it does. The earrings I ordered feel very heavy but that's to be expected. Everything is very pretty so I'm excited to wear it soon! I do, however, wish there were more options of pieces to buy. A lot of it just isn't my style.

title: Amazing quality,very beautiful jewelry.
text: Date of experience: December 21, 2021

title: Ring size was the only issue
text: Tracking was great, the pieces are lovely, but my ring is bigger than all of my other rings that are a size 7. I wear my earring pretty much every day though!! Overall a great experience!

title: The delivery took a while but loved the…
text: The delivery took a while but loved the products once they were here! They are beautiful will defs get me into wearing gold more often!
